title: YGOMarket
description: A full-stack e-commerce website that allows users to buy and sell Yu-Gi-Oh cards from one another. The web app features user authentication, filtering, shopping cart, and payment processing.
techstack: React | SASS | Node.js | Express | Stripe | MySQL | JWT

title: InStock
description: A full-stack warehousing and inventory management application that allows users to view/add/edit/delete warehouses and inventories in the system. Features modal views and form validations.
techstack: React | Javascript ES6 | SASS | Node.js | Express | JSON
